pages.text: $(li)The End Highlands is a biome composed of the outer islands of the End, forming the the hilltops in the center of each island.$(br)$(li)In this Biome you can find Chorus Plants to obtain $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/chorus_fruit)Chorus Fruit$(/l).$(br)$(li)Some creatues like $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/enderman)Endermans$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/spectre)Spectres$(/l) can be found here too.
$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)End Highlands$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
